Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.entity.living

Class Executor

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.entity.living.Executor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
Person, Pet
public abstract class Executor extends Object implements Component
Executor is a class that represents a person that can execute activities.
